arabic_text: أَفَأَمِنُواْ مَكۡرَ ٱللَّهِۚ فَلَا يَأۡمَنُ مَكۡرَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَّا ٱلۡقَوۡمُ ٱلۡخَٰسِرُونَ
translation: Do they feel secure from the plan of Allah? None can feel secure from the plan of Allah[37] except the loser people.
footnotes: [37] Even the most devout believers, as hearts are between the two Fingers of Allah, He directs it wherever He wishes.
